results.title: Super Flight
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Beyond 2000”.
A Beyond 2000 special which looks at the latest advances in aeronautics, from ultra-lights to gyrocopters, from fighters to paraplanes, in fact every way in which man can currently take to the air.

results.title: Super Deluxe poster
results.credit_line:
Thiagarajan Kumararaja, India, 2019

Courtesy Tyler Durden and Kino Fist
results.brief_description: “No other filmmaker has romanticised the Tamil cinema universe with pop culture references as much as Kumararaja,” wrote film critic Srivatsan S for The Hindu. A darkly comedic thriller, Thiagarajan Kumararaja’s 2019 feature Super Deluxe swept the international film festival circuit and fascinated audiences with its ambitious visual style. “Thiagarajan Kumararaja’s unstable mix of dark comedy, brutal thriller and Douglas Sirkian melodrama is shamelessly excessive but undeniably entertaining,” said Variety. Kumararaja’s first film in eight years, Super Deluxe wove together four different stories, all depicted with an amazingly vivid colour palette.

results.title: Super Cars
results.brief_description: Iain Finlay introduces sixty action-packed minutes that place you behind the wheel of the world’s most powerful and stylish speed machines.

results.title: Super Boats
results.brief_description: Come sailing on a worldwide, whirlwing adventure as Beyond 2000 examines the future of life on the ocean waves. A dinghy that flies, the world’s first water-jet propelled private luxury ocean cruiser, and windweapon - a cross between a windsurfer and a hang glider are just three of the amazing discoveries.

results.title: Super 8 soldiers
results.creator_credit: Mark Worth, Australia. Special Broadcasting Service and Kino Eye Pictures
results.brief_description: This unusual video explores the day-to-day life of Australian soldiers who served during the Vietnamese War. By using super-8 film footage that the soldiers took of themselves, we are taken from training in Australia to the camps in Vietnam where the young men were to confront the terrors of fighting a bitter guerrila war. The super-8 images are ultimately touching because they reveal young boys at the point of losing their innocence. The haunting musical score is by David Bridie and John Phillips of Not Drowning, Waving.

results.title: Super 8
results.brief_description: In 1979 Ohio, several youngsters are making a zombie movie with a Super-8 camera. In the midst of filming, the friends witness a horrifying train derailment and are lucky to escape with their lives.

constellations_other.name: Splicing history and silencing the lambs
constellations_other.description: With plastic strips coated with light-sensitive emulsions, film strips captured light and created moving pictures. In this Constellation we trace celluloid and splicing as plot device to serial killers, secrets agents and Super 8.

constellations_other.name: Making home movies
constellations_other.description: Home movies have inspired the form and plots of narrative cinema.

constellations_other.name: Sci-fi, surrealism and strangeness
constellations_other.description: Step through Portal 2 to explore the links between its sci-fi comedy and the world of film and TV.

results.description: In 1979 Ohio, several youngsters are making a zombie movie with a Super-8 camera. In the midst of filming, the friends witness a horrifying train derailment and are lucky to escape with their lives. They soon discover that the catastrophe was no accident, as a series of unexplained events and disappearances soon follows. Deputy Jackson Lamb, the father of one of the kids, searches for the terrifying truth behind the crash.
description_for_label: In 1979 Ohio, several youngsters are making a zombie movie with a Super-8 camera. In the midst of filming, the friends witness a horrifying train derailment and are lucky to escape with their lives. They soon discover that the catastrophe was no accident, as a series of unexplained events and disappearances soon follows. Deputy Jackson Lamb, the father of one of the kids, searches for the terrifying truth behind the crash.

results.title: Sunstruck
results.creator_credit: James Gilbert, James Grafton, Jack Neary and Immigrant (AU)
results.brief_description: After responding to a New South Wales government advertisement designed to attract teachers from Britain, a shy teacher from Wales is assigned to a one-teacher school in the isolated bush town of Kookaburra Springs. Initially he has problems adjusting to his new life as he struggles to gain respect from his students. Despite resistance he forms a school choir, which travels Sydney to participate in a singing competition. The trip is a success and on their return to Kookaburra Springs he decides to stay on in the town and marry. Primarily a vehicle for British singer and comedian Harry Secombe, the film was shot on location near the New South Wales town of Parkes with a budget of under $400,000. Cast also includes Maggie Fitzgibbon, John Meillon, Peter Whittle, Dawn Lake, Bobby Limb.
